title: Hail the Sun Discography
description:
Hail the Sun is a relatively new band in the post-hardcore/progressive rock scene. These guys are talented! If you ever get a chance to see them live - these guys are well worth it. They get straight up crazy on stage and still manage to make everything sound perfect. They're coming out with their first full length album this fall signed to Blue Swan records.

Discography:
POW! Right in the Kisser! - 256kpbs
Elephantitis EP - 256kpbs
Hanging Revelation (Single) - 128kpbs
